Package game

Class Level.Platform

java.lang.Object
game.Polygon
game.Level.Platform
Enclosing class:
Level
class Level.Platform extends Polygon
Platform is an inner class of Level that extends Polygon. If the player touches and obstacle from the sides or the bottom, the game is over. If it touches it from the top, it lands on the platform. All platforms are rectangular.
Author:
Justin Chai

    • Platform

      public Platform(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Constructs a new Platform object.
      Parameters:
      x1 - x-value of the left side of the platform.
      y1 - y-value of the top side of the platform.
      x2 - x-value of the right side of the platform.
      y2 - y-value of the bottome side of the platform.
